summary.do: Anything UX+UI, happy to run interviews and tests, design wireframes and mockups, or analyse user metrics. Also, glad to make use of what I know about programming if applicable!
summary.from: I was born and raised in Hong Kong, though I am part Swedish, which is where I am currently based.
summary.language: English: Native, Swedish: Intermediate, Indonesian: Basic
summary.contact:
Feel free to contact me directly on linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/eve-l-620764203/

See my experience and more below!

section1.param1: Conducted thesis on AI-enabled work tools & IT professionals*HCI: Embodied Interaction, Requirements within Agile Development, User Interface Programming I, Scientific Methods within HCI, Measuring and Analysing User Experience (Statistics)*Other: Reinforcement Learning, Information Visualization, AI for Game Programming 1 & 2, Big Data Analytics, Deep Learning for Industrial Imaging, Privacy Patterns for Software Design

section2.param1: All semesters in this program focus on sustainability (e.g., in service design, design methods, system thinking)*Extra Courses: Intro to App Dev with Flutter, Intro to Lifecycle Analysis, Digitalization of Society, Programming in C# I & II & III, Social Psychology, HCI, Web Management, Applied IoT Intro, Sustainable Development, 3D Modelling, Structured Programming with C++

section4.param1: Freelance Graphic Designer*Creation of marketing material, physical and digital in Hong Kong

section5.param1: UX/UI Design Intern*Was located in Helsinki, Finland

section6.param0: Evaluation by Anastasia Corjan, Senior Marketing Manager
section6.param1: "Eve has successfully completed her UX/UI internship at CubiCasa, demonstrating exceptional creativity, problem-solving skills, and a strong understanding of user-centered design. Throughout her internship, she contributed to various projects, including improving the user experience of our employee facing web portal and customer facing mobile app. Her ability to conduct user research, analyze feedback, and translate insights into intuitive design solutions greatly enhanced the usability of CubiCasa."

section7.param0: 2nd Place Winner in Uppsala Sustainable Mobility Hackathon 2023
section7.param1: Hosted by InnoCenter, supported by European Union

section8.param1: I enjoy photography, especially when travelling, art/digital illustration, badminton, hiking, and podcasts (like 'the next big idea' and 'no stupid questions')!</br></br>Also enjoy storytelling in generalâ€”from books to games, and am currently making a small game for fun.</br></br>Oh and I love my dogs, whom I train.
